headline: Pentair (PNR): Net Margin Slips Below Prior Year, Raising Questions on Growth Narrative
summary: Pentair (PNR) delivered annual earnings growth averaging 9.6% over the past five years, with forecasts pointing to 11.97% growth ahead. Revenue is expected to climb at 3.9% per year, noticeably slower than the US market’s 10.1%, and earnings estimates trail broader market growth as well, with a projected 12% increase versus 15.5% for the market. Net profit margins came in at 15.8%, down from 16.3% a year ago, and the most recent period recorded a dip in earnings compared to last year,...
